notes: The IESG decided in December 2011 that RFC 3934 should have been added to BCP 25, instead of being added to a new BCP (BCP 94). At the IESG's request, the RFC Editor moved RFC 3934 to BCP 25 (see https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/bcp25 for the list of RFCs in BCP 25). This leaves BCP 94 empty.
